Root.displayName: 宁波市国土与民政数据交互服务
Root.description: 国土与民政数据交互服务

SQL.QUERY: SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) BDCFKID,'{1}' YWID,'{2}' BDCFK001,'{3}' BDCFK002,'{5}' BDCFK003,'{0}' BDCFK004,'BDC-FC' BDCFK005 ,C.BDCQZH BDCFK006,'' BDCFK007,C.ZL BDCFK008,C.YT2 BDCFK009,F.SCJZMJ BDCFK010,C.YT2 BDCFK011,C.QLXZ2 BDCFK012,G.FDCJYJG BDCFK013,FZSJ BDCFK014,'现势' BDCFK015,D.DBSJ BDCFK016,'' BDCFK017,SYSDATE BDCFK018,B.QLBSM FROM MZ_QLR B INNER JOIN DJFZ_CQZS C ON C.QLBSM=B.QLBSM AND INSTR(C.QLR,B.QLRMC) >0 INNER JOIN SH D ON D.QLBSM=B.QLBSM INNER JOIN (SELECT SUM(SCJZMJ) SCJZMJ,QLBSM FROM H A INNER JOIN FDCQ_DYGX B ON A.BSM=B.DYBSM GROUP BY B.QLBSM) F ON F.QLBSM=C.QLBSM INNER JOIN FDCQ G ON G.BSM=B.QLBSM WHERE B.QLBM='FDCQ' AND C.QSZT='1' AND B.LZJH='{4}' UNION ALL SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) BDCFKID,'{1}' YWID,'{2}' BDCFK001,'{3}' BDCFK002,'{5}' BDCFK003,'{0}' BDCFK004,'BDC-FC' BDCFK005 ,C.BDCQZH BDCFK006,'' BDCFK007,C.ZL BDCFK008,C.YT2 BDCFK009,F.SCJZMJ BDCFK010,C.YT2 BDCFK011,C.QLXZ2 BDCFK012,G.FDCJYJG BDCFK013,FZSJ BDCFK014,'变更' BDCFK015,D.DBSJ BDCFK016,'' BDCFK017,SYSDATE BDCFK018,B.QLBSM FROM MZ_QLR_LS B INNER JOIN DJFZ_CQZS_LS C ON C.QLBSM=B.QLBSM AND INSTR(C.QLR,B.QLRMC) >0 INNER JOIN SH_LS D ON D.QLBSM=B.QLBSM INNER JOIN FDCQ_BHGX E ON E.QLBSM>0 AND YQLBSM=B.QLBSM INNER JOIN (SELECT SUM(SCJZMJ) SCJZMJ,B.QLBSM FROM H A INNER JOIN FDCQ_DYGX B ON A.BSM=B.DYBSM GROUP BY B.QLBSM UNION ALL SELECT SUM(SCJZMJ) SCJZMJ,B.QLBSM FROM H_LS A INNER JOIN FDCQ_DYGX B ON A.BSM=B.DYBSM GROUP BY B.QLBSM) F ON F.QLBSM=C.QLBSM INNER JOIN FDCQ_LS G ON G.BSM=B.QLBSM WHERE B.QLBM='FDCQ_LS' AND B.LZJH='{4}' UNION ALL SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) BDCFKID,'{1}' YWID,'{2}' BDCFK001,'{3}' BDCFK002,'{5}' BDCFK003,'{0}' BDCFK004,'BDC-FC' BDCFK005,C.BDCQZH BDCFK006,'' BDCFK007,C.ZL BDCFK008,C.YT2 BDCFK009,F.SCJZMJ BDCFK010,C.YT2 BDCFK011,C.QLXZ2 BDCFK012,G.FDCJYJG BDCFK013,FZSJ BDCFK014,'注销' BDCFK015,D.DBSJ BDCFK016,'' BDCFK017,SYSDATE BDCFK018,B.QLBSM FROM MZ_QLR_LS B INNER JOIN DJFZ_CQZS_LS C ON C.QLBSM=B.QLBSM AND INSTR(C.QLR,B.QLRMC) >0 INNER JOIN SH_LS D ON D.QLBSM=B.QLBSM INNER JOIN FDCQ_BHGX E ON E.QLBSM=0 AND YQLBSM=B.QLBSM INNER JOIN (SELECT SUM(SCJZMJ) SCJZMJ,B.QLBSM FROM H A INNER JOIN FDCQ_DYGX B ON A.BSM=B.DYBSM GROUP BY B.QLBSM UNION ALL SELECT SUM(SCJZMJ) SCJZMJ,B.QLBSM FROM H_LS A INNER JOIN FDCQ_DYGX B ON A.BSM=B.DYBSM GROUP BY B.QLBSM) F ON F.QLBSM=C.QLBSM INNER JOIN FDCQ_LS G ON G.BSM=B.QLBSM WHERE B.QLBM='FDCQ_LS' AND B.LZJH='{4}'

SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) BDCFKID,'{1}' YWID,'{2}' BDCFK001,'{3}' BDCFK002,'{5}' BDCFK003,'{0}' BDCFK004,'BDC-TD' BDCFK005,C.BDCQZH BDCFK006,C.QLR BDCFK007,C.ZL BDCFK008,C.YT1 BDCFK009,replace(C.MJ,'㎡','') BDCFK010,'' BDCFK011,C.QLXZ1 BDCFK012,G.QDJG BDCFK013,FZSJ BDCFK014,'现势' BDCFK015,D.DBSJ BDCFK016,NULL BDCFK017,SYSDATE BDCFK018 FROM MZ_QLR B INNER JOIN DJFZ_CQZS C ON C.QLBSM=B.QLBSM AND INSTR(C.QLR,B.QLRMC) >0 INNER JOIN SH D ON D.QLBSM=B.QLBSM INNER JOIN JSYDSYQ G ON G.BSM=B.QLBSM WHERE B.QLBM='JSYDSYQ' AND C.QSZT='1' AND B.LZJH='{4}' UNION ALL SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) BDCFKID,'{1}' YWID,'{2}' BDCFK001,'{3}' BDCFK002,'{5}' BDCFK003,'{0}' BDCFK004,'BDC-TD' BDCFK005 ,C.BDCQZH BDCFK006,C.QLR BDCFK007,C.ZL BDCFK008,C.YT1 BDCFK009,replace(C.MJ,'㎡','') BDCFK010,'' BDCFK011,C.QLXZ1 BDCFK012,G.QDJG BDCFK013,FZSJ BDCFK014,'变更' BDCFK015,D.DBSJ BDCFK016,NULL BDCFK017,SYSDATE BDCFK018 FROM MZ_QLR_LS B INNER JOIN DJFZ_CQZS_LS C ON C.QLBSM=B.QLBSM AND INSTR(C.QLR,B.QLRMC) >0 INNER JOIN SH_LS D ON D.QLBSM=B.QLBSM INNER JOIN JSYDSYQ_BHGX E ON E.QLBSM>0 AND E.YQLBSM=B.QLBSM INNER JOIN JSYDSYQ_LS G ON G.BSM=B.QLBSM WHERE B.QLBM='JSYDSYQ_LS' AND B.LZJH='{4}' UNION ALL SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) BDCFKID,'{1}' YWID,'{2}' BDCFK001,'{3}' BDCFK002,'{5}' BDCFK003,'{0}' BDCFK004,'BDC-TD' BDCFK005 ,C.BDCQZH BDCFK006,C.QLR BDCFK007,C.ZL BDCFK008,C.YT1 BDCFK009,replace(C.MJ,'㎡','') BDCFK010,'' BDCFK011,C.QLXZ1 BDCFK012,G.QDJG BDCFK013,FZSJ BDCFK014,'注销' BDCFK015,D.DBSJ BDCFK016,D.DBSJ BDCFK017,SYSDATE BDCFK018 FROM MZ_QLR_LS B INNER JOIN DJFZ_CQZS_LS C ON C.QLBSM=B.QLBSM AND INSTR(C.QLR,B.QLRMC) >0 INNER JOIN SH_LS D ON D.QLBSM=B.QLBSM INNER JOIN JSYDSYQ_BHGX E ON E.QLBSM=0 AND E.YQLBSM=B.QLBSM INNER JOIN JSYDSYQ_LS G ON G.BSM=B.QLBSM WHERE B.QLBM='JSYDSYQ_LS' AND B.LZJH='{4}'
